activities:
Personal information may be received as part of the normal information obtained and required for the MetraNet billing system operation.

Personal information stored on a MetraTech Corp system may be used for system troubleshooting as request by a client but is secured from outside access and not distributed in any fashion.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, customer billing information and employee profiles. None of this is manually processed.
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
